definition: to approach (a numerical value)/to converge to a limit (in calculus)/convergence
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge

sentences.english: Wages in eastern Germany have also edged up towards western levels.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，德东的人均收入水平已经趋近德西。

sentences.english: Any action that takes us Godward is a good action.
sentences.chinese: 任何使我们趋近于神的行为都是善行。

sentences.english: This paper presents a variable rate reaching law for discrete variable structure system based on the attenuating control.
sentences.chinese: 提出离散变结构控制系统基于衰减控制的变速趋近律。

definition: to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to become more and more/to gradually become
to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
to press close to/to snuggle close/intimate
to clamber up/(of prices etc) to rise
